Token.Text: Heightened senses and an awareness of their surroundings have allowed this race to focus during combat. Projectiles fired by their weapons are reliably able to inflict 20% more damage.
Races that evolve weak sensory organs suffer a penalty in space combat. Projectiles fired by their weapons inflict 20% less damage.
As a result of their streamlined and coordinated use of resources, efficient races earn a 25% reduction to the maintenance costs of ships and structures.

Aeroponics is the use of a hydro-atomized spray to deliver nutrients to plants suspended in the air. This technique offers excellent plant growth and eliminates the need for soil while at the same time minimizing pathogen risks. +1 flat bonus to Food production, +10 storage, and +0.1 food per colonist assigned.

Biospheres are special, highly adaptable living habitats. Biospheres may only be built on uninhabitable terrain. In doing so, the terrain becomes habitable and the planet gains maximum population based on the Colonists per Tile. Other buildings can thereafter be built underneath the biosphere.
population cap; turns inhabitable tiles into habitable tiles
Cloning Centers increase the population growth of a planet at a fixed rate of 0.02 per turn.

Deep Core Mines are extremely effective at rapidly extracting minerals from deep within a planet's core, but are environmentally disastrous. Adds flat rate production equal to four times a planet's mineral richness but decreases a planet's fertility by 3!
(-3) fertility on build, +production equal to 8 x richness, +50 storage

The output of this Genetics Research Facility scales with the amount of colonists dedicated to the task, providing +.2 research per assigned colonist. it also provides some extra flat food bonus to the colony
+.2 research per assigned colonist, +1 Food per turn
The Imperial Bank building increases the efficiency of your planetary tax operations by 40% and increases credits per colonist by 0.25.

TokenList.Token: 431 `Imperial Offices allow for the direct taxation of the citizenry, granting incomes at a rate of 0.25 credits per colonist and +10% Tax per turn.

Token.Text: This missile silo fires long range guided anti-ship missiles for maximum planetary defense.
Fires 3 long range missiles into orbit
A dedicated research lab allows colonists to begin in earnest the study of their new home. Provides a flat +0.5 per turn research bonus to any colony.
+0.5 research per turn, +0.1 research per assigned colonist
Manned and automated rovers provide indispensable labor savings to fledgling colonies, increasing the production of the colony with a flat +1 production bonus and some storage.

A space port connects to the orbital star base above and allows for the construction of ships here using materials produced on the planet. Provides a 50% bonus to all monetary incomes earned on this planet.
+50% tax revenues, allows ship construction, aids in ship repairs, adds some storage.

Xeno Farms are large complexes dedicated to the successful integration of our farming and husbandry techniques with alien soils and nutrients. The production of this building scales with the number of farmers assigned on this planet. Provides +0.5 food per turn per assigned colonist.
Xeno mines are the first real step toward's exploiting a planet's mineral deposits, creating +.75 production per colonist assigned to industrial tasks.

If we channeled highly-ionized Plasma directly from a ship reactor through a magnetized, high-pressure system, then we could spray our enemies with super-heated energy to devastating effect. Very effective against Armor but weak against shields. We also can now use similar methods to build a medium plasma cannon
Increases the range of all sensors by 50%.

By creating massive shield projectors, we can envelop entire ships, including escort ships, inside a single shield bubble. The power costs are massive but our military scientists believe that we can create excellent screening ships with this technology.

The combat information center consolidates all command and control functions into a single module. From here the crew can coordinate sensor data, manage damage control teams, organize shipboard defensive actions, and more. Provides ship wide bonuses to various system and small warp inhibitor bubble.
A small shield developed specifically for our fighter and corvette ships. It is weaker than our medium shield generator, but still provides increasingly important protection for small craft.
A medium range missile launcher on a swivel turret shooting 4 missiles per salvo. It also has the Terminal Phase system.

Medium range multi-rocket launching system. It has a terminal phase system, meaning at a certain range from the target, the missile will disable the guidance system and will greatly accelerate to avoid interception.

A bomb bay that allows a ship to strike a planet with low-yield tactical nuclear bombs. The Target planet will suffer temporary reduction to its Fertility level. Constant bombing might permanently reduce fertility and even change the planet's climate forever.
Reactors are the beating hearts of spaceships. This basic fission model provides a moderate level of power output and power storage. Explodes when destroyed.
Power Plants are the beating hearts of spaceships. This basic fission model provides a moderate level of power output and power storage. Explodes when destroyed.

Ordnance represents a ship's stores of munitions and explosives such as bullets, missiles, torpedoes, mines, and other special weapons. A basic ordnance locker such as this one provides a captain with a safe and convenient place to store their munitions.

An ordnance supply bay allows a ship to launch resupply shuttles filled with ammunition to resupply friendly ships. Only one shuttle may be active per bay at a time. Supply shuttles can ferry 100 ordnance at a time.
This heavy-mount phasor array has a fixed spinal facing and a 45 degree field of fire.
Phasors are powerful and efficient directed energy weapons.
A turret mounted photon cannon weapon, highly effective in any combat situation.
Twin photon cannons mounted on a turret platform with advance cooling systems for rapid and sustained fire.
This weapon is best used at low speeds and close ranges. Higher speeds cause the plasma to disperse ineffectively, and the weapon is simply useless at range. But up close, it is devastating.
Plasteel armor provides approximately 25% less protection than steel armor but does so with half of the mass
Plasteel armor provides approximately 25% less protection than steel armor but does so with half of the mass
Plasteel armor provides approximately 25% less protection than steel armor but does so with half of the mass.
A turret mounted polaron cannon weapon. Bypasses shields.
Twin polaron cannons mounted on a turret platform with advance cooling systems for rapid and sustained fire. Bypasses shields.

This is an inexpensive but bulky electromagnetic capacitor. Any ship equipped with pulse capacitors will be substantially more difficult to disable with electromagnetic pulse weaponry. They also help the ship recover faster from EMP overloads.
A devastatingly powerful energy cannon. An expansion upon photon technology, this cannon fires guided energy photon projectiles that are very unlikely to be intercepted by Anti Missile weapons.
This large shielding generator will provide substantial protection for our ships over a much wider area than previous shields. It was designed to be used effectively on larger ships.

This medium shield generator was developed in response to the need for stronger, less energy dependant shielding module for our ships. It requires less power than our Class I Magshields and provides much more protection, but has a slightly smaller range.
New materials reduce effective ship mass by 8% across the board.
New materials reduce effective ship mass by 12% across the board.
New materials reduce effective ship mass by 16% across the board.
New materials reduce effective ship mass by 20% across the board.

The schematics for this building were found in the ruins on the Remnant homeworld. We believe that this device will allow us to transcend our physical forms. We won't know until we build it and turn it on.
(+0.1) fertility on build, +7 food per turn
This megastructure employs advanced agricultural techniques and robotics to create massive quantities of food
The Flechette shotgun is a close combat weapon. The rounds fired by this shotgun are designed to shatter upon impact for the greatest possible damage to lightly armored targets.
These bays are slightly larger than standard ones. They store larger ships, and are more efficient at launching them.
Quantanium Armor plating has a density 10 times that of steel, making it incredibly strong but also incredibly massive. It is expensive to produce.
Change audio, video, and gameplay settings. Changes do not require restart.
The Hyperspace Flux has abated \nShips may once again warp freely
A massive hyperspace flux is inhibiting warp travel throughout the galaxy
has suddenly shifted in its orbit, resulting in an improved climate
has experienced a massive volcanic eruption \nThe environment has been severely damaged

Add ship designs to this fleet from the panel on the right. Use 'Shift' key to place multiple ships of the same type. When you are done, you can press the 'Requisition' button, which will search your empire for ships that can fill your fleet. If you do not have the ships, it will order that they are built at a suitable planet.\n\nReturn here at any time to requisition replacements for any ships that are lost in combat.

You are not currently editing a fleet. Click a hotkey on the left side of the screen to begin creating or editing the corresponding fleet.\n\nWhen you are finished editing, you can save your fleet design to disk for quick access in the future.

Add ship designs to this fleet from the panel on the right. Use shift key to place multiple ships of the same type. When you are done, you can press the 'Requisition' button, which will search your empire for ships that can fill your fleet. If you do not have the ships, it will order that they are built at a suitable planet.\n\nReturn here at any time to requisition replacements for any ships that are lost in combat.
You may scrap this building by right clicking on it

This crystalline structure syncs with and amplifies the brain waves of biological organisms. Simply put, everything that gets near to it becomes smarter. +0.5 research per turn to the owner of this planet

Commodities are special resources that are limited in number and provide unique bonuses to colonies that possess them. Commodities are harvested automatically at colonies where they occur naturally. They can then be moved throughout your empire using freighters. You may specify whether you wish to import or export any commodities you have access to in this panel.

This broadside-mounted cannon is capable of delivering a higher-powered kinetic blast than its turret-mounted cousins. Weapon mobility and target tracking are traded for the opportunity to unleash hellish volleys of unaimed fire.

For a ship to be warp capable, it must have a Warp Core installed. Warp Cores provide a Warpable Mass Capacity. If a ship's mass is less than or equal to a ship's Warpable Mass, then it can achieve faster than light travel.
This warp core is small and inefficient but is capable of driving a ship farther and faster than any conventional propulsion system
This fighter-bomber weapon has a relatively huge impact for its size. It has a small guidance package but relies on the momentum of its mothership for its speed.
An energy-based space bomb that is twice as effective versus shields
With the proper equipment, swarms of small vessels can be a danger to even the largest ships

Making an object with mass travel faster than the speed of light is not possible in real space. A warp drive achieves FTL travel by encasing a ship's mass in a subspace bubble, effectively removing it from real space while the drive is engaged.
Subspace Tunneling is the science of identifying the most efficient route between two real space points in the decidedly more complicated web of subspace
By integrating new advances in the fields of cooling and power transfer, we are able to build a larger and more efficient warp core suited for use in capital ships
A balanced engine that provides decent thrusting and maneuvering capabilities as well as an afterburner for inter-system travel
This engine has only two states: off or full burn. It is not suitable as a maneuvering engine but is the most efficient engine for sublight inter-system travel
This engine provides excellent combat maneuvering and thrusting but has no afterburner capabilities. It is less efficient than other engines
Advances in cooling and propellant delivery mechanisms are allowing us to reach farther and farther into the stars.
While it may not seem entirely safe to do so, we have discovered that we can create small nuclear explosions behind our ships and capture this energy to reach interstellar targets

The theory for the Impulse Drive is similar to the Nuclear Drive. The real advancement is in our ability to control the strength of the explosions, allowing a more general application of the technology
This newest generation of engines provides larger, more powerful, and more efficient sublight thrusters
A combat thruster featuring an improved thrust to power ratio
A more powerful and efficient frigate-sized afterburner meant for long-range burns
A balanced and efficient frigate engine
Bigger, better, and more efficient than earlier designs, these engines are suitable for usage on cruiser class vessels
A large and efficient cruiser-class afterburner engine for making long range sublight burns
A balanced cruiser engine with good combat and afterburner performance
A high-powered engine designed to provide combat maneuverability to cruiser-class vessels
The pinnacle of sublight engine technology, these engines are meant for the largest of ships
A monstrous and powerful engine for sublight combat maneuvers
A titanic afterburner for sublight acceleration
A massive and balanced engine for use on the largest ships
When our scientists thought about how to make Space Bombs more effective, the best they could come up with was to make a bigger bomb
This weapon is affectionately called the Mother of All Space Bombs due to its huge blast effect
The number of explosive threats in the galaxy mandates further investment in point defense weaponry
All point defense weapons receive a 25% bonus to their rate of fire
All point defense weapons receive a 25% bonus to the speed of their projectiles
All point defense weapons receive a 25% bonus to their range
The beating heart of a capital ship, this warp core is massive, powerful, and efficient
Building large reactors that are fit for space travel is really a matter of containing the radioactive and thermal output of the reactor to protect ship crew and systems
This cell stores reactor fuel suitable for use in Warp Reactor and afterburner engines
This device stores power, which is required for the operation of many ship systems including shields, weapons, and certain types of engines
These rare metals are raw materials suitable for refinement into usable reactor fuel. A fuel refinery is required to process these materials.
This building converts raw Fissionable Materials into usable Reactor Fuel, creating 100 reactor fuel per 1 Fissionable Material available each turn
A mine that extracts raw Fissionable Materials from a planet with the Fissionable Materials Resource. The more Fissionable Materials resources a planet has, the faster the extraction
Trees? Who needs trees. What your people needed was room for more factories. +1 homeworld richness, -1 homeworld fertility
The data-stream from the Remnant Mothership holds the key to the Mystery of the Remnant. We need to study it immediately, before we're all destroyed!

As the Remnant Exterminators sweep across the galaxy, burning and killing all that they find, you step inside the completed Ascension Array. In one glorious moment you are given True Knowledge. You are all things that have ever lived. You know all the joys and sorrows of your people and every people to ever populate the galaxy. You experience lives beyond counting. You are Father and Son reunited, friend and foe, predator and prey. You are the light at the end of the tunnel. \n \n And you are not alone.

WARNING: CPU INTENSE! This option will force a full combat simulation for 100% accuracy even when battles are occurring out of sight and between non-player factions. If this option is unchecked, an approximation will be used to speed up the game instead.
You are the worst race in the known universe. A worthless piece of trash that can't do anything right and deserves to be annihilated!
A fresh water reservoir surrounded by fertile soil and lush plant life.
A huge, cleverly hidden subterranean complex, evidently constructed for a large population to take shelter. With such advanced technology, what could these people have been afraid of?
Provides shelter for a large amount of population.

An enormous pyramid-shaped structure, lined with advanced tunnels and rooms. These constructions are seen throughout the history of many ancient civilizations, all related to unsettlingly similar religious entities.
Provides housing for a large amount of population.
Self sustaining planetary defense. This platform automatically launches a swarm of drones to fight enemy ships near the planet. Requires Drone technology to operate.
Planetary defense system. Attacks foes with a swarm of drones.

Long Range Missiles are designed to out-range any other weapon. This comes with the drawback of slower missile speeds and maneuverability, but it contains multiple warhead system designed to decrease chances of interception.
The mark II has a decent range and damage improvement over the mark I.
The mark III has a substantial range and damage improvement over the mark II.
A high speed Gauss rifle with great range and damage.
This heavy auto cannon fires a massive spread of bullets, at a decent range
This variant fires slower and in small bursts
This Facility is a large ordnance storage which has a dedicated fabricator module. It is very power hungry.
Small armored ordnance lockers provide storage and defense
Self sufficiency is extremely important in long and drawn out combat situations. Our engineers came up with this solution, a large fabricator and storage bay
A second warehouse provides storage for 150 extra food and production.
A third warehouse provides storage for 150 extra food and production.
X-Ray Pulse Beam turret fires rays of deadly X-Ray lasers in quick succession. It has near perfect accuracy and short to medium range, which makes it a good anti-fighter weapon.
Fires a fast burst of supercharged Anti-Matter shells over great distances. Does extra damage to Shields and Armor and has a 60% chance to bypass Shields.
By further stabilizing matter / anti-matter reactions, we have managed to weaponize our research into powerful anti-matter weaponry.
This is a fighter specific small version of the Anti-Matter Reactor. It has very good power output, but it explodes if destroyed.
An incredibly strong neutronium laced alloy resistant to all forms of damage.
An incredibly strong neutronium laced alloy resistant to all forms of damage.
An incredibly strong neutronium laced alloy resistant to all forms of damage.
An extremely high strength and temperature resistant alloy.
An extremely high strength and temperature resistant alloy.
An extremely high strength and temperature resistant alloy.
An incredibly strong neutronium laced alloy resistant to all forms of damage.
An extremely high strength and temperature resistant alloy.
Build your very own asteroid base in a safe orbit around your home planet. Featuring every modern commodity to which you have become accustomed. Exactly the thing that every humanoid species needs!

HV Vulcan cannons fire at velocities so high that the strength of materials upon impact is very small compared to inertial stresses. Thus, even metals behave like fluids under hyper-velocity impact. Extreme hyper-velocity results in vaporization of the impactor and target. They are very effective versus armor.

This armor can withstand a decent amount of damage. Where it shines however is with the nano repair bots that are released when the ship starts taking damage, healing every module on the ship. The effects of the equipped armor modules are cumulative and a ship equipped with regenerating armor is a force to be reckoned with.

This armor can withstand a decent amount of damage. Where it shines however is with the nano repair bots that are released when the ship starts taking damage, healing every module on the ship. The effects of the equipped armor modules are cumulative and a ship equipped with regenerating armor is a force to be reckoned with.
Recent advances in miniaturization, shielding and energy research have allowed us to incorporate a small electro-magnetic shield into our armor plating.
Recent advances in miniaturization, shielding and energy research have allowed us to incorporate a small electro-magnetic shield into our armor plating. Requires a power source to operate.
Better thrusters, faster missile engines, better targeting sensors, and increased payloads allow us to develop new LRM platforms.
We can focus our efforts on improving our medium range missiles arsenal.
Better thrusters and improved targeting sensors allow us to develop new LRM systems.

A rapid fire, short range burst missile platform. Especially deadly against smaller fast moving ships, it functions most practically as an anti fighter/corvette weapon. It features a wide targeting angle, and a slight chance to penetrate enemy shields.
Prototype SRM platform. A rapid fire, short range burst missile platform. Especially deadly versus smaller and fast moving ships, this was designed mainly as an anti fighter/corvette weapon.
A plasma projector uses a massive array of plasma generating nodes to project a storm of high-energy plasma shells towards a target.

We are now able to build heavier plasma weapons by using the previous ionized reactor Plasma and pushing it to new limits with higher pressure. The magnetized pressure system requires, however, more constant power and even extra reactor power to fire.
Various research options to upgrade ship and weapon components and more.

Although steel armor is inexpensive, it is extremely heavy and reduces the maneuverability of our ships significantly. By focusing our research efforts into developing new construction materials, we have discovered a new alloy. It is slightly weaker than steel, but very easy to repair.
An anti-matter projector uses a massive array of anti-matter generating nodes to project a storm of highly unstable anti-matter shells towards a target. It has a 25% chance to bypass Shields.

The Menoetius launch bay launches 4 mines. They have a 33% chance to penetrate even the strongest shields. Once they get through the shield their internal reactors will cause a violent chain reaction making them explode with tremendous force. Vulnerable to PD weapons.
A sphere of anti-matter contained in a magnetic field that releases upon impact, allowing the anti-matter to explode. Can be shot down. It has a 50% chance to bypass Shields.
A sphere of plasma contained in a magnetic field that releases upon impact, allowing the plasma sphere to explode. Can be shot down.
Our scientists have made a breakthrough in their research towards matter / anti-matter reactions, granting us access to a new weapon.
Emp mines attempt to strike vulnerable systems and sensors in an effort to temporarily stop ships from attacking. Vulnerable to PD weapons.

Rapid Fire Lasers, or Blue lasers, are fast firing laser cannons specially designed for fighters and corvettes. Blue colored projectiles fire in rapid succession, causing the weapon to go into a long cooling period. Ideal weapon for fast moving ships using strafing runs.
Shield buster mines specialize in quickly depleting the shields of enemy ships. Vulnerable to PD weapons.
Anti-armor mines are armed with special high explosive charges to penetrate even the thickest hulls. Vulnerable to PD weapons.
The small mine launcher casts out a single explosive mine. Lacks the operating range of the larger versions but can easily be mounted on smaller hulls. Vulnerable to PD weapons.
This heavy auto cannon is equipped with armor piercing rounds.
This heavy auto cannon is equipped with high explosive armor piercing rounds.
This light auto cannon is equipped with armor piercing rounds.
This light auto cannon is equipped with high explosive armor piercing rounds.
The light auto cannon fires a steady stream of bullets providing a barrage of suppressive fire where needed.
The Scythe machine gun is an excellent deterrent to small fighters and tracking weapons. It fires a near constant stream of bullets at anything that dares to get near.
The Scythe machine gun is an excellent deterrent to small fighters and tracking weapons. It fires a near constant stream of bullets at anything that dares to get near.
A single LRM missile launcher, convenient and deadly.
This MRM platform launches a salvo of 8 missiles at unsuspecting targets. This weapon can easily overwhelm even the most potent point defense systems with its Terminal Phase system.
Two railguns mounted on a swivel turret. A very efficient weapon system.
A high speed Gauss rifle with great range and damage, armed with armor piercing rounds.
A high speed Gauss rifle with great range and damage, armed with high explosive armor piercing rounds.
Research and discover a wide array of guided, self propelled weapon systems.

This set of technologies will improve our ability to effectively combat the many smaller ships on a battlefield. In addition to anti-fighter missiles which can be equiped on our own fighters, we can also manufacture Storm weapons for our larger vessels, swivel turrets that are excellent at targeting small enemy ships.

The Gauss Cannon is a type of projectile accelerator consisting of one or more coils used as electromagnets in the configuration of a linear motor that accelerate a ferromagnetic or conducting projectile to high velocity. We can create cannons which use electro magnet accelerators to fire very accurate and very high speed projectiles. Hence the name - "Sniper"
We can now modify our Gauss Cannon projectile to use armor piercing components while maintaining almost the same accuracy and speed.
The addition of High Explosives to our sniper cannons could make them even more useful.
Rapid fire autocannons fill the skies with lead.
Rapid fire autocannons fill the skies with lead. These variants are equipped with armor piercing ammunition.
Rapid fire autocannons fill the skies with lead. These variants are equipped with high explosive armor piercing ammunition.
This ancient pillar appears to be highly valuable. Our scientists are eager to find out what they do. They suggest you send some troops to investigate.
At one time an abandoned warehouse, now cleaned and fixed up, this large warehouse provides storage for 200 extra food and production.
Use this module in combination with the normal colonization module. This module contains a small manufacturing plant, providing a +0.5 bonus to production on the newly colonized planet.
Use this module in combination with the normal colonization module. This module contains a small food replicator, providing a +0.5 bonus to food on the newly colonized planet.

This heavy cannon fires a lethal volley of Graviton particles, compressed in a high density tritanium coating. Upon impact, this coating ruptures, releasing an extremely violent tide of gravitational forces. Shields will lessen its destructive power, however.

Weapons equipped with grav-rounds use anti-grav generators mounted inside large cannons. They do little impact damage, but create an aimed kinetic push effect, pushing any vessels away that are fired on.
Weapons that do not fall into a specific category and are considered not part of the norm.
Use this module in combination with the normal colonization module. This module contains a small laboratory, providing a +0.25 bonus to research on the newly colonized planet.

The small laboratory allows your scientists to get started with research efforts, mainly on new colonies with harsh environments. It is usually deployed by a Colony Ship and its biggest advantage is that it can be built even on uninhabitable tiles. But costs are high when built out of scope of a Colony Ship.

The manufacturing plant makes all kinds of useful items for early colony development and is usually deployed by a colony ship. Its biggest advantage is that it can be built even on uninhabitable tiles. But costs are high if built out of scope of a colony ship.

The food replicator provides healthy, replicated food for a colony. Replication amounts are rather low, but it can be enough for an early stage colony, and might be sufficient for small mining colonies as well. Its biggest advantage is that it can be built even on uninhabitable tiles. But costs are high if built out of scope of a colony ship.
Use this module in combination with the normal colonization module. This module will deploy a Military Outpost to defend your colony.
Use this module in combination with the normal colonization module. This module will deploy a missile silo for long range colony defense.
Great range and pinpoint accuracy are what make this planetary weapon emplacement stand out.
Heavy and rapid suppressive fire should deter any unwelcome vessels from landing on our planets.
Cloud Peak surface to space guided missiles have extreme range and are capable of providing defensive control over most of an entire star system.
It is wise to improve our planetary defense abilities with weapons that can deter invaders. A series of giant SAM launchers should be a good start.

The Dragons Breath shotgun is a close combat weapon. The burning plasma rounds fired by this shotgun are designed to superheat the exposed areas it hits, melting away any defenses the ships might have.
The E.S. shotgun is a close combat weapon. It is equipped with high explosive shells, dealing damage in a large area.
The H.V.E shotgun is a close combat weapon. It is equipped with high velocity emp shells, capable of immobilizing enemy ships for short periods of time.
The Repeater shotgun is a close combat weapon, and a close cousin to the Flechette shotgun. It fires non-stop until it either runs out of ammo or destroys its target.

Shotguns are close combat weapons. They are designed to do heavy damage spread over an area. Depending on the type of ammo used, they can do different types of damage. These weapons fire fast and are accurate.

This armor can withstand a decent amount of damage. Where it shines however is with the nano repair bots that are released when the ship starts taking damage, healing every module on the ship. The effects of the equipped armor modules are cumulative, and a ship equipped with regenerating armor is a force to be reckoned with.

This armor can withstand a decent amount of damage. Where it shines however is with the nano repair bots that are released when the ship starts taking damage, healing every module on the ship. The effects of the equipped armor modules are cumulative, and a ship equipped with regenerating armor is a force to be reckoned with.
This plasma cannon is best mounted on frigates. It fires a stream of plasma shells towards unsuspecting targets.
This is a small forward thruster, installed on the exterior of the ship and not on the usual dedicated engine space. Cost effective when more speed is needed.
This is a slightly bigger forward thruster, installed on the exterior of the ship and not on the usual dedicated engine space. Cost effective when more speed is needed.
This is big Anti-Matter forward thruster, installed on the exterior of the ship and not on the usual dedicated engine space. Cost effective when more speed is needed.
This is very big Anti-Matter forward thruster, installed on the exterior of the ship and not on the usual dedicated engine space. Cost effective when more speed is needed.
This is a dedicated Anit-Matter warp engine. Most of it can be installed inside the ship for greater protection. It does not provide Thrust or Turn Thrust.
This is a dedicated warp engine. Most of it can be installed inside the ship for greater protection. It does not provide Thrust or Turn Thrust.
This is a dedicated warp engine. Most of it can be installed inside the ship for greater protection. It does not provide Thrust or Turn Thrust.
As our control over the galaxy grows, we must improve our hyperspace and subspace travel times. We are focusing on external thrusters and more integrated systems for fighter/corvettes.

The Experimental Gate Facility comes with an active prototype stargate that can send your troops on away missions. Exploring new worlds and civilizations might bring with it new technologies, riches beyond your imagination or incredibly dangerous and potentially deadly encounters.
Can open a two-way gate to far away worlds and galaxies.

The Magnetic Accelerator Cannon is an immensely powerful weapon, capable of destroying small vessels in one shot, whether they have shields or not. Because it is so large, heavy, and power hungry, only Titan class ships should use these.
A medium cargo hold with rudimentary life support capabilities. This particular hold can store 9 units of either food or production, or a small number of colonists.

The first generation of Rapid Fire Lasers designed for fighters. This is mainly a first working prototype for this type of energy weapon. Its main con is a long delay between bursts, necessary for the weapon to cool.
Improved Version of Mk1. Thanks to the larger size of heat sinks, it can maintain rapid fire for longer periods of time, increasing the number of projectiles fired.

An advanced rapid fire Laser that can fit in a fighter hull. Thanks to the bigger advanced rail type magnetic barrel, projectiles can be fired from a larger distance, and each shot has increased energy storage for more devastation on impact
Green version of the standard heavy laser cannon. It has been modified to have higher damage per shot and greater range, but also lower fire rate. It is also slightly better versus Shields.
Purple version of the standard heavy laser cannon. It has been modified to have lower damage per shot, but faster fire rate. It has a very small chance to completely bypass shields.
Multi purpose missiles are a military standard in space combat, they were created for trading fire with any ship.
Long Range Support Missile turrets were created for vessels that can't go toe to toe with enemy heavy hitters. Ideal for Carriers so they can stay out of enemy range and contirbute to the battle.

This is a bigger version of the small module. It is also more efficient and usually more cost effective than multiple smaller modules stacked to the same size. See the Small module description for armor details.
Defines the radius of planetary gravity wells. Larger values means ships need to be further away from a planetary body to engage FTL, et vice versa.
has successfully complete training\nThe Agent's performance exceeded expectation.
has successfully completed training\nand has gained valuable knowledge.
was injured in a training accident.
was killed in a training accident.
has completed training, but failed to learn anything useful.

was killed trying to incite rebellion on
escaped after being detected while trying to incite rebellion on
has been promoted, and gains +1 Level.
This research branch will focus on the means of defending our ships and colonies from enemy fire. We have several fields we can begin research in.

A tactical nuclear weapon, or non-strategic nuclear weapon, is a nuclear weapon which is designed to be used on a battlefield in military situations, mostly with friendly forces in proximity. Adapted for space usage, nuclear effects are less profound than with atmospheric detonations, but still often cause EMP damage.
Nuclear tactical missile. Can cause devastating effects and also EMP damage
Anti Capital Ship missiles, much more powerful than regular missiles.
Dual Anti Capital Ship missiles. We also improved the ATCM itself, introducing slightly increased range and damage
Dual Anti Capital Ship missiles. We also improved the ATCM itself, introducing slightly increased range and damage
An experimental Oscillating mounted missile launcher. Very expensive, but can launch 6 improved versions of ATCSM at a time.
An experimental Oscillating mounted missile launcher. Very expensive, but can launch 6 improved versions of ATCSM at a time.
An experimental weapon designed for the next generation of Torpedo Launchers. Well armored, but costly.
An experimental weapon designed for the next generation of Torpedo Launchers. Well armored, but costly.
This is a Fighter version of the ATCSM. Smaller size, but decreased range and damage.
These hangars are able to store even bigger ships than any other previous hangars, biggest benefit from StarLancers is their ability to relaunch ships way faster after they get destroyed.
Mounted on large ships, this Repair Bay will significantly add to the the ship's repair capacity. It also contains a small power plant, making it useful as an auxiliary power conductor.
Internal FighterBay, can install inside the ship.
Internal BattleRaider bay, can install inside the ship.
Internal AssaultRaider bay, can install inside the ship.
Internal StarLancer bay, can install inside the ship.

This is a combination of early stage Metal armor, with the addition of solar collectors. These collectors, though providing less power flow than simple and armored solar panels, do also store a small amount of power within. Drawbacks are higher cost, and lower rigidity (even lower than Internal Bulkheads). As a bonus, they have some resistance to beam weapons, since the collectors need heat in order to provide power.

This is the first improvement over steel armor. Reactive armor reacts in a certain way with offensive ordnance. It is stronger than Steel Armor, but costs more. It performs a little better against kinetic weapons.

This Armor is slightly stronger than Reactive Armor, weighing less but costing more. It's Kinetics Resistance is improved and it has some Beam Resistance. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I.
Stronger than steel and has some resistance to Kinetics

Twice as strong as Steel Armor, a little bit lighter, and 4 times the cost. This armor provides better Resistance vs. Kinetics and Beams, and it has some Resistance vs. Energy Projectiles. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I

This armor is very expensive to process, yet is almost as strong as Composite Alloy Armor, while managing to weigh much less. It offers improvment in Kinetic, Beam and Energy Resistances, while have some Explosion Resistance as well. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing II

Bionic armor is installed externally on ships for protection. It can regenrate itself, repair the ship, and provide turn thrust. It Consumes power and weighs a lot. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I

Though not strong enough to serve as an external armor, this metal can replace internal bulkheads and help repair the ship when not in combat and also has self regeneartion abilities, even in combat. It has a high power consumption, even when not repairing anything.
Shapememory Alloy can slowly repair itself when damaged.

Organic Armor consumes power and creates small quantities of ordnance for the ship, while also adding some ship repair ability and self regeneration. It also contributes to EMP protection and is somewhat resistant to energy projectiles and beams. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I
Organic Armor won't self repair but slowly regens ammo instead.

By combining Artificial Organic Material and Previous Bio Armor, we can create a substance with all the characteristics of both materials, while also improving their Energy Weapons and Beam Resistance.
A result of the combined bionic and organic plates. The plate now repairs the whole ship and regenerates ammo.

Armored Solarpanels. Provides some power flow and storage to space ships, at a lower rigidity and slightly higher price. This armor also has an interesting ability to slightly amplify installed shields in ships.
Armored Solarpanels, provide some to spaceship

This armor improves upon Electro Armor in several ways. It generates more power flow, provides more rigidity, grants more power storage, better amplify installed shields, and it supplies a larger radius of power. It is still, however, less strong than conventional steel armor. It has some resistance to beam weapons, as the collectors need heat in order to provide power.
Advanced Armored Solar collector, provides power within a small radius.
This Armor is the culmination of the best solar armor technology we can create thus far. It is stronger, better amplifies shields, and generates better power flow and power storage.
Experimental Shield-Generator Armor. A type of experimental armor, create a small shield nearby. !DRAWN POWER HEAVILY!

This Armor has bvery improved Shield Amplification Technology. It is stronger than Steel Armor, but it costs more, weighs more, and needs power as well. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I
The mass-produced version of Experimental Electronic Armor-5 Fairy(XSGA5). Greatly reduces energy comsuption and also improves power storage, range, and Shield Amplification.

A better Shield Amp Armor, which can also store more power than previous armor. Production costs of this armor are very high, but the benefits are obvious. Vulnerability to Energy projectiles is futher reduced with this technology.

The Frontier Armor is composed of Ceramic Armor, Composite Armor, amd large Shield Amplification module. This makes it very durable, and almost self sustained. The toughness of the armor is somewhere between Ceramic and Composite Armors. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing I
A quickly rotating Gatling Turret. The rotating barrels have increased the number of projectiles that can fire. It also features a 180 degree angle of engagement. Will only fire upon enemy missiles.
A larger point defense gatling turret. A high fire rate and an engagement angle of 360 degrees make this the optimal defensive weapon against enemy missiles.
Flak AA Cannons have twice the range of normal PD weapons. A good weapon versus missiles and fighters. They feature a 180 degree fire arc.
Advanced FlakAA Cannons are a larger and more powerful rapid fire Flak weapon, capable of targeting fighters. They feature a 360 degree fire arc.
Experimental Flak AA Cannon. Engage angle: 270 degree.
Spring-mount cannons, using default AP ammo. +5% damage against armor, but -15% damage against shields. Explosion radius: Medium
Spring-mount cannons, using special APFSDS(Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding-Sabot) ammo. +30% chance of penetrating shields. Explosion radius: None/Low
Spring-mount cannons, using special HESH(High-Explosive Squash Head) ammo. +20% damage against armor, but -80% damage against shields. Explosion radius: Extra Large
A very big, double barreled mass driver, using AP ordnance. Its sheer is somewhat effective versus armor, but less effective versus shields. The shots do, however, explode on impact.
A very large, double barreled mass driver, using special APFSDS Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding-Sabot) ammo. Its sheer projectile mass has a chance to ignore shields.
A very large mass driver, using special HESH (High-Explosive Squash Head) ammo. It is effective against armor, but less effective against shields. Its explosion radius is very large, however.
Spring-mount cannons, using default AP ammo. +10% damage against armor, but -15% damage against shields. Explosion radius: Medium
Spring-mount cannons, using special APFSDS(Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding-Sabot) ammo. +50% chance to penetrate shields. Explosion radius: None/Low
Spring-mount cannons, using special HESH(High-Explosive Squash Head) ammo. +40% damage against armor but -75% damage against shields. Explosion radius: Extra Large
Spring-mount cannons, using default AP ammo. +15% damage against armor, but -15% damage against shields. Explosion radius: Medium
Experimental Spring-mount cannons, using special APFSDS(Armor-Piercing Fin-Stabilized Discarding-Sabot) ammo. +50% chance to penetrate shields. Explosion radius: None/Low
Spring-mount cannons, using special HESH(High-Explosive Squash Head) ammo. +40% damage against armor but -70% damage against shields. Explosion radius: EXX Large
A slightly better version of the older Nuclear reactor. It will explode if destroyed, but it provides more power while also being a little sturdier.
The overload Fusion reactor produces more power by augmenting its fusion capabilities with other advanced technologies. As a result, its mass and cost are higher, and it is very fragile.
The Overload Anti-Matter Reactor will provide 150% more power than a normal one. However, their inherent instability makes them fragile, and they have a small power supply range.

A protective chamber contaning the linked power output of 6 Quantum Fusion Reactors. The chamber is also equipped with a small auxiliary shield and damage control team, allowing it to contribute to ship repairs.

A repurposed hangar containing 6 anti-matter reactors. The hangar comes equipped with a small auxiliary shield and a damage control team that can aid in ship repairs. Beware however, a powerful explosive blast will occur if the hangar is destroyed.

A Parallel Black hole Reactor Set. 6 Connected Plasma Reactors. Huge power output. The reactor hangar is also equipped with a small emergency shield and damage control team, allowing it to self repair. Note however, a massive explosive blast wave will occur if destroyed!

A Cold Fusion Reactor. Very stable, and won't collapse violently. To achieve this, we had to lower its power output, giving it the same energy production as our previous Fusion Reactors. The addition of an enclosed armor shell allows for a safer power output radius.

By sacrificing a small amount of power, we were able to surround this Cold Fusion Reactor in protective armor plates, heavily increasing its durability and almost completely containing the explosion in the case of a structural collapse.

This medium sized Anti-Matter Reactor inside an armor encasing will contain most of the explosion damage from the reactor in the case of its destruction. Unfortunately, due to structural limitations, it is not possible to design larger armored Anti-Matter reactors.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is a massive auxiliary high-speed booster, designed to be installed on the exterior of a ship. It provides massive forward thrust and small warp thrust, but no turn thrust. It also features an integrated shield for self defense.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is massive auxiliary high-speed booster. A fast recharge shield has been installed for self protection. Can only be placed on the outside layer of the ship. Due to the high power draw and integrated systems, this module explodes when destroyed.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is a massive auxiliary high-speed booster, designed to be installed on the exterior of a ship. It provides massive forward thrust and small warp thrust, but no turn thrust. It also features an integrated shield for self defense.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is a massive auxiliary high-speed booster. A fast recharge shield has been installed for self protection. Can only be placed on the outside layer of the ship. Due to the high power draw and integrated systems, this module explodes when destroyed.

As our civilization grows, we must find ways to exploit more of our colonies' industrial potentials. Research in this area involves many steps towards the creation of a robust industrial backbone that will maintain our economy.
Upgraded Xeno Mines exploit more of the planet's mineral deposits. Their byproducts can be sold in local markets, yielding income.
Developing efficient automation is a crucial step required to push a higher production output from our colonies.

A Robotic Factory. A great technological marvel. These factories use robots for production, and are almost fully automated. They require very little sentient intervention. Products from these factories contribute to the farming industry, providing extra food. Assembled devices allow extra leisure time for the colonists, leading to increased revenue. Unfortunately, byproducts of the huge production lines affect the planet's climate. The factory also aids a little with the ship repair capacity of orbiting ships.
(-0.75) Fertility On Build, +6 production per turn, +1 food per turn, +15% tax, +100 storage
Advanced Miniature Nanobots will automatically spread out underground, bringing minerals to the surface. Due to environmental effects, they are recommended to be built on mining colonies.
(-0.3) Fertility On Build, +4 production per richness, +30 storage
This research will make production procedures almost fully automated and can make every colony a main production hub.

An Almost self sufficient updated variant of the Robotic Factory. Its environmental effects are reduced, it contributes to the research industry, and it also frees up some time for colonists to spend at home, increasing consumer revenue.
(-0.2) Fertility On Build, +7 production per turn, +0.25 research per turn, +10% tax
In order to stay happy and useful, our colonists must have sufficient food on their tables. We must invest in more efficient farming methods to increase food output on each colony.
Upgraded Xeno Farms use even more advanced farming and husbandry techniques on alien soil. Byproducts of Upgraded Xeno Farms can be sold, adding taxable income to the colony.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is a massive auxiliary high-speed booster, designed to be installed on the exterior of a ship. It provides massive forward thrust and small warp thrust, but no turn thrust. It also features an integrated shield for self defense.

The Vanguard Over Boost (VOB) is a massive auxiliary high-speed booster, designed to be installed on the exterior of a ship. It provides massive forward thrust and small warp thrust, but no turn thrust. It also features an integrated shield for self defense.
This is a basic, twin barrel Auto Turret designed to operate in vacuum. Its main advantage is that it can be fitted on smaller ships.
A medium sized Auto turret. 3 Barrels, medium to long range, and heavy projectiles. These work well when installed as a group.
The heaviest turret that can be practically installed on star ships. It has four barrels and good fire coverage.
Turn Thrusters are small thrusters installed on the side of a ship. They can significantly increase a ship's turn rate.
Turn Thrusters are small thrusters installed on the side of a ship. They can significantly increase a ship's turn rate.
Turn Thrusters are small thrusters installed on the side of a ship. They can significantly increase a ship's turn rate.
Turn Thrusters are small thrusters installed on the side of a ship. They can significantly increase a ship's turn rate.

The 406mm Exp Gatling Cannon 'ForAnswer(XGC-63)' takes the term 'quantity over quality' to a whole new level, and will quickly turn any ship foolish enough to enter within its range into unrecyclable junk! It also eats through ammunition like it's going out of fashion.
Plasma Shotgun, suited for close range combat.
Twin Plasma Shotgun, suited for close range combat.
Ion Shotgun, suited for close range combat.
Triple Ion Shotgun, suited for close range combat.
Void Shotgun, suited for close range combat.
The Experimental Auto Void ShotGun (XAVSG-Shattered Skies) requires a huge amount of power to fire. However, shield generators will barely hold up to the shot.

This is an advanced fusion powered fighter generator, combined with some of the new cold fusion tech. It is easier to be cooled in a fighter or corvette frames, therefore it is not available for larger hull types. It is still highly volatile upon destruction.
Fighter VOB provides high warp power in combination with a small shield. Due to the high power draw and integrated systems, this module will explode if destroyed.
Having forward firing vulcans on our fighters is useful, but we need superior alternatives with wider fire arcs if we want to make fighters really count in skirmishes.
We can improve our fighter turrets by adding superior firepower. These require more efficient vacuum ammunition loading mechanisms.
The Fighter Quick-Firing 17-pounder is a 76.2 mm anti-ship cannon that provides our fighters with useful anti ship capabilities.
An experimental void Projector(XVP-Scarlet Rain). just like the name implies, it fires projectile-like rain over targets until they are utterly destroyed.
A Torpedo class weapon mounted on fighters. Due to its smaller size, it has comparatively lower damage and range than capital ship torpedoes, but its usefulness is still apparent.
As our ships grow larger, so too do their munition requirements. We can invest research into more efficient, larger storage modules for our ammunition, allowing for more sustainable firepower.
This facility stores ammunition more efficiently than smaller ammunition storages.
This facility is a dedicated ordnance manufacturing module. Our larger ships will surely benefit from it during drawn out battles.

With the invention of nanobots, we now have a way to improve all of our storage techniques. These little robots will sort, transport, and assemble any kind of weapon or ammunition required. They will also allow us to construct an efficient Nano Storage structure on our colonies, able to store and sort massive amounts of food and production.
This Colony upgrade module will provide a newly founded colony an additional 30 food and production. Very important in the early stages of any colony.
This Almost fully automated ammunition storage facility is designed for our capital class ships.
A Battle Cruiser is an alternative Cruiser design allowing for more weaponry classes to fit within.

Military Bases are another step forward in colony ground defense. This building allows you to train infantry-class troops at your colony just as with Military Outposts, but they are sturdier and pack more of a punch when holding off ground invasions.
It would be wise to improve our planetary defenses with weapons that can deter invaders. A series of giant SAM launchers could be a good start.
A fortified area on the planet with trenches, defense emplacements, and planetary shielding generators.
We can install internal Plasma bomb bays on our Bombers, capable of inflicting heavy damage to enemy ships, especially versus Armor. The number of bombs per module is limited.
We can develop Internal Ion bomb bays on our Bombers. They would be slightly more effective against shields, while also inflicting EMP damage.
This massive ship would be great for assaulting planets or breaking through defensive lines. However, it is extremely heavy, thus making it susceptible to flanking.

We can perfect our farming methods on alien planets in such a way that we will significantly improve our planetary environments, making our colonies flourish. Another step towards truly planet-wide terraforming.

Advanced Xeno Farms expand upon the Upgraded Xeno Farm technology, enabling the construction of massive farms that produce more food, and less byproducts. A drawback is less income from byproduct market sales.
Very strong, resistant to Energy Projectiles and Beam. Creates ordnance, turn thrust, has EMP protection, self regenerates, and repairs the ship. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing II
This torpedo tube launches slow-moving but devastating torpedoes, packed to the hilt with explosives. They require substantial ordnance to fire and can be intercepted by point defense weapons.

Crystal Shield Amplification Armor. Provides more Shield Amplification. The Crystals in this armor are processed and designed to "Streamline" hyper space travel, boosting Warp speed. It also stores abit more power. Cost is high. Energy Cannon vulnerability is minimized.

Hyper Active Armor is a thorough blend of all our knowledge in Solid State Armor Technology. The mass is slightly higher than the already very light Crystal armor, but it fares well against most known damage.
Streamlined for hyper space, powerful shield Amplification module, and the toughest underlying armor in this series of technology. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing II

A blend of all Solid Armor plates. It reacts with most attack types and reduces their damage. It offers improvments in Resistance over all armor of lower tiers. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing II
An improved version of the previous Fighter Torpedo. Slightly more damage, and faster.
Anti Matter bomb bays can inflict heavy damage upon enemy capital ships. The bombs are powerful, but have no special abilities beyond their pure destructiveness.
This deadly turret has a medium to long range, and can fire rapid high energy projectiles which will bypass shields half of the times. It will also deal increased damage to armor.

Representatives within The Energy Research branch believe they can now use current energy military knowledge to construct fast-tracking Energy Point Defense weapons, useful for intercepting incoming anti-ship enemy missiles.
We can now create Point Defense "Laser" projectiles that will pack more punch against incoming missiles, while retaining the same projectile speed.
An improved version of our kinetic platform cannons, now featuring even higher range, faster projectiles, and more damage.
Our most advanced orbital platform weapon yet. With the extreme range, fast projectile speed, and long reload times, some have come to calling them orbital sniper cannons.

A high performance twin Kinetic Cannon, specially designed for small and heavy platforms in high orbit around a planet. It features a high range, and the 360 degree swivel allows for the maximum field of fire.
Information in war is most crucial, with that mindset long range sensors were developed. Equiping a ship with a sensor module increases its detection range to 22 000 units.

The Automated Factory is a marvel of engineering, working almost completely without sentient intervention, and remaining environmentally friendly. It also adds storage to the colony, and doubles the ship repair capacity of the colony for orbiting ships.

The planetary customs station maintains a small fleet of vessels that board and inspect all ships moving throughout the system. This ensures that all customs and taxes are paid. It also adds some storage space.

The GalNet is a computer network spanning your entire empire, using specialized satellites and passing ships to carry information across the vast gulfs between the stars. Not only does it give access to staggering amounts of silly animal pictures, it also improves research and commerce on any planet connected to it.
The Galactic Stock Exchange is the central place where stocks of galactic mega-corporations are traded. The proceeds can be taxed.

The Geo Survey Satellite Network measures changes in the density of the planet's crust, allowing for the easy detection of all major ore veins. It is mostly suited and cost effective for planets with high richness.

This incredibly massive, highly advanced structure will provide room for 4 billion population. Due to the extreme amount of land and resources required for construction, planetary fertility will be moderately reduced.

Instead of the common breeding programs of the past, this building clones meat from various races of xeno livestock, taking advantage of the best genetic attributes. It produces less food than Xeno Farms, but maintenance is very low. Thanks to healthier meat, more ethical lifestyles, and more land available for crops, population growth slightly increases.
A luxurious resort for the very-well-off. Provides a significant boost to planetary commerce.

A particle accelerator, as the name implies, accelerates particles to nearly the speed of light, smashing them together at relativistic speeds to find new information about the makeup of the universe. Provides 1 point of research per scientist. Rumors of the potential for an irreversible black hole consumption event caused by this device are likely greatly exaggerated.
The Planetary Stock exchange allows stocks of planetary companies to be traded. This improves commerce on the planet and thus tax revenue.

While advances in miniaturization have made computers smaller, they may inversely allow computers to be scaled up almost indefinitely. Set into the planetary crust, this gigantic computer can crunch almost unimaginable amounts of data, helping scientists immensely. Provides a flat +1 per turn research bonus to any colony, and increases production.

This building adapts local and foreign flora to grow better within a planet's individual climates, promoting greater yields. Thus, larger areas of the planet can sustain agriculture, in effect improving the fertility level.
In an attempt to improve agricultural output, the planet's soil is enriched to support plant growth, increasing fertility.
The System Research Network links all research labs, universities and test centers in a system together, allowing scientists to communicate and cooperate easily, limited only by the speed of light.

Using advanced computers and a network of specialized satellites, this buildings monitors the global weather and directs measures to manipulate it to improve plant growth. This increases the average fertility of the planet.

Certain advanced alloys cannot be produced under conditions of gravity. Orbital production plants allow fabrication in zero gravity, increasing productivity, and aiding the repair capacity of orbiting ships.

Rather than raising whole animals for meat, this facility will grant us the ability to efficiently clone edible meat to exact specifications, eliminating the need for slaughterhouses and freeing up vast tracks of land. This will improve the food supply of the colony and promote a growing population.

Specifically designed to house as many people as possible, Hive Cities rise high above the planet's surface, providing housing for 4 billion people. Each home is fitted with advanced holographic emitters and spacial distortion fields, allowing people to comfortably live in an incredibly small area, with as much freedom as they could possibly desire.
Combining artificial and natural fertilizer, we can improve a planet's fertility to increase agricultural output.
By manipulating local and alien plants, we can adapt them to the environment to grow better and yield more. In effect, this increases a planet's fertility.
By manipulating a planet's climate, we can decrease devastating weather effects while preserving the optimal conditions for plant growth. In effect, this increases a planet's fertility.
We can create a network of satellites that will help discover new ore veins, whereas with conventional detection methods they would ordinarily be overlooked.
Certain advanced alloys can only be produced in zero gravity. We can now build facilities that exploit microgravity for production.
Even the star systems without extensive asteroid belts still receive the occasional visitor. With this technology, we can track and mine these passing asteroids.
Using advancements in computing and industrial robot design, we can create a factory that produces goods almost completely without intervention.
While linking computers together seems fairly simple on a planet, it is quite a bit more difficult between planets.
Using new discoveries in chip design, we can create a supercomputer capable of crunching incredible amounts of data.
The last remaining questions about the origin of the universe can be answered by taking the smallest parts of it and smashing them together.
If connecting planets of a system together was difficult, transferring data between systems will be even harder. With this technology, we can now finally open high data transfer in the GalNet.
Trade between planets must be regulated to protect the local economies, avoid ecological contamination, and, most of all, to ensure that the state get its cut of all proceeds.
Any planetary government seeking to stimulate economic growth would be well-advised to create a place where companies can find investors. The increase in tax revenue is just a bonus.
The more planets we explore, the more areas we find that lend themselves well to tourism. Building a resort allows the very wealthy to spend their money in one of these beautiful havens.

The level of revenue exchange our galactic mega-corporations require is far beyond the scope of what one planet can accommodate. It would be wise to create a single place in our empire where these corporations can meet with investors. It would be equally wise to tax them for it.
+0.1 research per assigned colonist, +0.25 Flat Research, +20% Tax
(-0.5) Fertility on build +4 planet population, +100 storage
+10 Production per turn, +100 Storage, aids in ship repair
+0.25 food per assigned colonist, +0.05 population per turn
+0.75 flat Research, +0.25 research and credits per colonist
+0.25 production per assigned colonist, +20 storage, aids in ship repair
A basic module that allows for the control of a small craft's direction.
Having developed nuclear-thermal engines, we can now adapt the smallest version to provide attitude control for our small craft. This increases their maneuverability.
Having developed Plasma Torch engines, we can now adapt the smallest version to provide attitude control for our small crafts. This increases their maneuverability.
Having developed Antimatter engines, we can now adapt the smallest version to provide attitude control for our small crafts. This increases their maneuverability.

This power plant works on the principle of nuclear fission. A containment breach will lead to a rapid irradiation of large portions of the surrounding area, which usually means the ship would have to be scuttled.

This power plant works on the principle of matter-antimatter annihilation. Its power output is similar to the Overload Fusion Reactor, but at less cost, and more rigidity. A containment breach will lead to a violent explosion.
These enormous guns can run the entire length of a frigate, giving even our smaller ships a fairly hefty punch that will threaten ships twice their size.
This enormous gun runs the entire length of a cruiser, giving any ship featuring it a fairly hefty punch.
This enormous gun runs the entire length of a battleship. It can deliver a devastating blow to any ship foolish enough to cross before its bow.
This gun is the absolute last word regarding any kind of enemy. Larger by itself than many frigates, it can destroy certain ships in only a single hit.

This armor is made up of Liquid Crystals. These are made to flow into any breach and harden in seconds, allowing the armor to repair itself in moments. This gives it unprecedented durability, granting 20% better protection by mass compared to Ceramic Composite Armor. Needs power to function.
Sanitation buildings reduce the fatalities from natural diseases, improving lifespans for the colony. The maintenance of these structures costs progressively more as the colony grows.
Educating future scientists and engineers is the key to our empire's survival. However, the larger a colony gets, the more it costs.
+0.1 production and +0.2 research per assigned colonist
By investing in the transportation network of a planet, production can be made more efficient.
A scaled-up version of the Medium Ordnance Storage, this module holds more ammunition and is more cost effective.
Advances in ship design and material science allow for much larger cargo holds to be constructed. This one holds 5 units of food, production or frozen colonists.
Advances in ship design and material science allow for much larger cargo holds to be constructed. This one holds 15 units of food, production or frozen colonists.

Rather than redesigning the cargo hold, this new approach aims to redesign the cargo. By placing it in standardized, self-sufficient containers, we can maximize the amount of cargo carried. This container deck carries 10 containers for a combined storage of 22 units of food, production or frozen colonists.

Bringing together the best and brightest of our Empire will give huge benefits to research and engineering. In one place, our scientists and engineers can cooperate without the barrier of distance. Only one Imperial University can be built per empire.

A clever combination of solar panels and steel frames allows for a system that provides power while simultaneously shielding the modules behind it. Provides 25% less armor strength per mass than conventional steel armor and has to be placed on the outside of the ship.
Using new breakthroughs in hull reinforcement and super structure, the Tsunari have developed this substantially larger freighter.
A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Steel Armor plate for added durability. An effective weapon against fighters and missiles. It has 60% strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate
This general-purpose cannon turret fires kinetic projectiles at high velocity that deal significant damage upon impact. Ideal against armoured targets.
Solar Panels harvest energy from stars to supplement a ships main power core.
Whilst only capable of withstanding a few hits, Magnetic fields are able to cover a wide area and are restored rapidly. This makes them ideal for drawn out skirmishes with smaller ships.
This frigate engine has been pushed to the limit, using twice as much power to deliver an additional 50% thrust.
All-in-one power diagnostics unit. Provides and stores power as well as increasing warp speed.
Coupling multiple engines allows core components to be shared, reducing weight and power usage without a loss to maximum thrust. This does make it easier to disable, however.

This external engine channels energy directly from the central warp core and is able to boost a ships speed a significant amount, at both warp and sublight speeds. Unfortunately, safety standards require that this engine design cannot be used for maneuvering; this is to avoid the unfortunate possibility of the ship tearing itself to pieces.
Solar Panels harvest energy from stars to supplement a ships main power core. This variant is mounted on a Steel Armour Plate to maximize ship defense.
Placed on the outside of a ship's hull, these units are charged slowly until they form a powerful, albeit highly localized electromagnetic shield.

Putting recent innovations in warp theory to work, this drive is capable of traversing systems in mere seconds. While its speed puts conventional drives to shame, it is incredibly power hungry and must be recharged in-between jumps. The structural integrity of this module is very unstable. It is advised to protect it with armor.
Gunships are a specialized range of lighter Frigates. They are designed to carry a vast array of weaponry, but are often easily destroyed due to their lack of armor.
This Class V shield is a sturdier improvement of the Class III shields. It also costs more, weighs more, and needs more power to function.
This is a better armored and more powerful canopy generator. Its power draw is exceptionally high.
Advanced storage and food preservation techniques allow for massive storage upgrades on our colonies. An extra 500 food and production can be stored in this hi-tech structure's warehouses.
+0.75 research per turn, +0.2 production per assigned colonist
+1 food per assigned colonist, +2 Flat Food, +75 storage
We have perfected a new technology to further increase the survivability of our missile-based weaponry by protecting them with advanced armor plating.
Advanced Electronic Counter Measures can further confuse enemy point defense sensors into missing their targets.
We are able to fortify an area on colonized planets which will make ground invasion and orbit bombing harder.
Defensive Building; +1000 Planetary Shields, 2 injuries to each invading troop
A Single barreled, energy point defense turret. Created in mind of the constantly growing danger of guided weapons. It has rather low damage, but is accurate and fast firing.
An improvement of the basic energy point defense turret. While bigger, it has two barrels, improved rate of fire, and more damage.
Fires auto cannon shells into orbit
Fires high speed shells into orbit
This military facility provides a barracks, armory, mess, firing range, and other facilities needed to train and equip infantry for ground combat. It is more advanced than the military outpost.
Fires long range, very rigid torpedoes.

As our control over the galaxy grows, we must improve our hyperspace and subspace travel times. We are focusing on external thrusters, more integrated systems for frigates, and Nuclear Thermal thrusters for improved turn rates.

As our control over the galaxy grows, we must improve our hyperspace and subspace travel times. We are focusing on external thrusters and more integrated systems for cruisers, new cruiser turn thrusters for improved turn rates, and a new jump drive design.

As our control over the galaxy grows, we must improve our hyperspace and subspace travel times. We are focusing on external thrusters and more integrated systems for battleships, more advanced jump drives, and a plasma torch thruster.

As our control over the galaxy grows, we must improve our hyperspace and subspace travel times. We are focusing on external thrusters and more integrated systems for titans, advanced jump theory, and antimatter thrusters.
Anti-ship Gatling (ASG) turrets will increase fighter effectiveness in the battlefield. It is essentially a vulcan cannon mounted on a turret for better field of fire.
These Heavy Anti-Ship Gatling turrets can almost double the projectile amount per burst, and use larger ammunition for higher damage. All of this on a better turret with wider field of fire.

Using our knowledge in Nano Machinery, we can create Nano Mining Bots. These tiny machines will save a lot of time and effort ordinarily wasted by transporting and drilling in conventional mining operations.
Provides power flow, power radius, and power storage within the ship. Not as strong as steel armor, and much more expensive. It also has an improved Shield Amplification technology.

Ceramic Armor can withstand a little more punishment than Reactive Armor, but the true benefit is the decrease in mass. Ceramic Armor is very effective vs. Beams and Energy projectiles, and somewhat effective vs. Energy Projectiles. It is also more expensive than Reactive Armor.
Breakthroughs in Chemistry allow for the design and construction of armors twice as strong as steel, with improvements all arcoss the board.

Purple Crystals are almost as tough as Composite Alloys Armor. We can create armor from these purple crystals, but processing it will be highly expensive. The result would be a very strong armor, with reduced mass, and adding explosion resistance.
For our fighters to survive in an ever more advanced battlefield, better shields will be needed. We can link two shield generators together, creating an overall stronger shield.
Cold fusion is a type of nuclear reaction that would occur at, or near room temperature. This is in contrast with "hot" fusion, which takes place naturally within stars, and under immense pressure.

Breakthroughs in shield amplification lead us to much better amplification in these armors, at the cost of some power draw. We managed to negate some of the previous vulnerability to energy projectiles, but it still remains an issue.

Using knowledge gained from previous Solar Armor, we can reach energy production higher than 50% of Nuclear Reactors within a new armor. The code name given for this project is "Fairy". These also have increased shield amplification.
We can construct even bigger hangars to launch small frigate size crafts.

This dedicated bomber module launches a barrage of unguided, low accuracy space bombs. The bombs cause EMP damage, and are slightly more effective versus shields, but less effective versus armor. Launches 4 bombs per salvo.
This module launches a barrage of unguided, low accuracy space bombs. The hot plasma is highly effective versus armor. This module fires 4 bomb per salvo.

By repurposing the open space of a hangar bay, we should be able to safely chain together multiple anti-matter reactors, increasing the efficiency of their overall energy output. The hangar might not be very protective, but it's the best our engineers could come up with.
We can construct and maintain very large bays for frigate support.
Since fighters offer limited space for systems, our scientists recommend investing research into a high output fusion generator, tailored specifically for fighter skirmishes.
We are able to envelop our Cold Fusion Reactors with decent armor, while still occupying the same space as a normal Cold Fusion Reactor.
We are able to envelop our Anti-Matter Reactors with decent armor, while still occupying the same space as a normal Plasma Reactor.

In a fusion reactor, the principle is that neutrons generated from Deuterium-Tritium fusion reactions will be absorbed into a blanket containing lithium, which surrounds the core. The lithium is then transformed into tritium (which is used to fuel the reactor) and helium.
It is now possible to improve our Class III shields' output and add Ceramic armor plates around them for more protection.
It is now possible to improve our Canopy shields' output and add Ceramic armor plates around them for more protection.
We can now install Torpedo class weapons on fighters.
We can develop a new fighter hull type. This fighter will have more internal modules for heavier anti-ship bomb loads.
We can increase fighter battlefield effectiveness by designing better anti-ship cannons.
We can design dedicated workshops for ordnance fabrication on capital ships.
We can create missile systems specifically dedicated to destroying enemy capital ships, armed with a warhead capable of efficiently damage armor.
We can improve our Anti Capital Ship Missiles by making more powerful warheads at destroying armour.
We can develop technologies that will allow Anti Capital Ship Missiles to be installed on smaller crafts.
We can develop technologies for smaller torpedoes to be installed on fighter craft.
Further technological improvements for fighter torpedoes.

Improving ship Anti-Missile defense systems may limit the loss of life for our ships and crews. We can look into upgrading the previous Phalanx point defense cannons with better radar and more firepower.

With reliable space-based gatling technology finally complete, we should strive for more firepower against the increasing threat of missiles in the battlefield. A larger defense platform will allow us to accomplish this.

AutoTurrets are large, mass driver guns with wide firing angles. They are designed to overwhelm enemy ships with many fast projectiles. Progression in this field involves the design of larger, more powerful turrets.
