We can adapt our old air defense weapons for usage in space. These flak turrets will now be capable of targeting fighters, in addition to missiles. Future versions of this weapon will require our engineers to create a larger firing platform.

Now that we have a working practice of installing the smaller Flak AA Cannons, our scientists have been able to devise a larger, more powerful platform, perfect for missile and fighter defense on our larger ships.

Advancements in material science now allow us to construct a Shape Memory Metal. This metal will repair itself and other parts of the ship, given enough time. This material also possesses a unique explosive resistance, making it a useful interior bulkhead.

Bionic alloys can be used to construct a truly unique armor. Slightly stronger than Steel, it can repair the ship, self regenerate, and provide small turn trust through miniature gyroscopic effects in the Bionic Network. It is more expensive than ShapeMemory Alloys, and consumes some power.

We can create an interesting artificial, very hard, but light, organic material. It draws power to maintain functionality, but possesses many special attributes. It is somewhat resistant to energy weapons and beams, thanks to its natural ability to reshape itself. This ability means it can produce ordnance as well. It also has some energy and EMP resistance.

Combined Organic and Bio Armor. Although less strong than Organic Armor, it has many useful characteristics. It repairs and creates ordnance for the ship, provides turn thrust, self regenerates, and grants EMP protection. The drawback is that it consumes a lot of power. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing II

This is the most advanced Material we can create in this series of technology. It has all of the Organic Bioplate characteristics, along with some improvements. We have finally turned one of its weaknesses into a strength. Not only is it now much stronger, but its hunger for power is so great, that it has become very resistant to destructive energy beams or projctiles. The cost is very high.

With advancements in AI sorting networks and improved infrastructure, we are able to further perfect the efficiency of our ordnance carrying ship modules. They now support greater ammunition per container than we had ever thought possible, and are mostly automated.

After completely eliminating all manual intervention and maintenance, our ammunition management centers have become completely self contained. By incorporating ammunition drones and robots, the AI seems to utilize advanced logistics needed for the constant flow of ammunition in these very large ship modules. We no longer understand exactly how the AI functions, but it is extremely efficient.
We can develop even larger cannons than the massive cannons, designed specifically for Battleships and Titans. They will consume massive amounts of ordnance, but will inflict massive damage as well.

By linking the output of our quantum fusion reactors, we can ensure their protection within a small space, and amplify their power output through intuned modulation. They will be protected by their encasing and the addition of a local shielding generator.
If we are willing to take the risk, we can construct a higher power flow Fusion Reactor, but at increased mass and cost.

We are now able to control an advanced magnetic field that can contain multiple, smaller size Anti-Matter reactions. If we are willing to take the risk, we can construct a higher power flow Anti-Matter Reactor that will utilize this newer, more advanced magnetic field. If destroyed, the resulting explosion will be devastating.
Hyper Acceleration can use advanced, massive magnetic coils to accelerate solid projectiles to relativistic speeds, once thought impossible for such amounts of mass.
We can create heavy, multi barreled cannons, assuming you care more for mass drivers than energy.
This is a smaller version of the capacitor, meant for ships with limited space. It is less efficient, however.

Quantum mechanics concerns the physical phenomena of the smallest scales known. Taking advantage of many tiny changes in quantum energy, this reactor is able to generate power. The variations in energy produced by these reactors is very predictable, making them quite stable. Because of this, they can be built on scales larger than any other reactors thus far.

This is a Fighter version of the Quantum Fusion Reactor. It produces less energy than an Anti-Matter Fighter reactor, costs more, and weighs more. Its major strength, however, is that its explosive force is much weaker in comparison to its Anti-matter equivalent.

This is the medium version of the Quantum Fusion Reactor. It produces less energy than Anti-Matter medium reactors, costs more, and weighs more. Its major strength, however, is that its explosive force is much weaker in comparison to its Anti-matter equivalent.

This Quantum Fusion Reactor produces less energy than Anti-Matter Fighter reactor, costs more, and weighs more. Its major strength, however, is that its explosive force is much weaker in comparison to its Anti-matter equivalent.

This Quantum Fusion Reactor is the biggest single reactor we can build thus far. Its weight and cost is very high. Its major strength, however, is that its explosive force is much weaker in comparison to Anti-matter technology.

We can now construct an incredibly powerful, very large Anti-Matter Reactor. The amount of Anti-Matter stored within is extremely volatile, and should the reactor be destroyed, a powerful explosion will no doubt take place.
We are able to envelop our Quantum Fusion Reactors in decent armor, while still occupying the same space as a normal Cold Fusion Reactor.
This Quantum Fusion Reactor has protective armor to contain most of the blast in case of a reactor explosion.

Although still a mystery to even our greatest minds, this invisible material can be coalesced into small areas. To accomplish this, gigantic, advanced gravitational machines pull ordinary matter apart over vast distances, making way for the dark matter to seep into a proverbial bucket of gravitational potential. By then surrounding and compressing it, usable energy is continuously emitted, making for an incredibly reliable source of power.
This reactor will provide high and stable energy for our ships. Other sizes of Dark Matter reactor are not produced, due the the standardized way the dark matter is collected.

This bomb bay can utilize very powerful Tactical or Strategic Nuclear payloads to bombard enemy colonies. It has a high destructive potential. The target planet will suffer a temporary reduction to its Fertility level. Constant bombing might permanently reduce fertility and even change the planet's climate forever.

Organic molecules, even those from different worlds, all share many commonalities. By aggressively attacking those common roots, we have created a bomb that will very rapidly and thoroughly kill anything it comes in contact with. A few of these bombs will unquestionably destroy an entire civilian population in short order. The target planet will suffer a temporary reduction to its Fertility level. Constant bombing might permanently reduce fertility and even change the planet's climate forever.

This highly destructive bomb turns everything caught in its explosion radius into gamma rays. Very efficient for clearing out enemy colonies. The target planet will suffer a temporary reduction to its Fertility level. Constant bombing might permanently reduce fertility and even change the planet's climate forever.

Tritanium Armor is three times stronger than Steel Armor. Though the existence of this material was already previously known, its mass was not yet practical for ships. With our knowledge in Hyper-Active Armor, we can now design low mass Tritanium armor. The cost is very high.
The ultimate armor. The strongest material known for its mass/strength ratio. It also nullifies the effect of Armor Piercing III
This version of the Mass Driver has a shorter barrel, made to fit into smaller ships. Its projectiles have shorter range and less explosion radius.
The Dual Mass Driver features a dual cannon deployment, each cannon sporting larger barrels that pack more of a punch.
We are able to envelop our Dark Matter Reactors with decent armor, while still occupying the same space as a normal Dark Matter Reactor.

This Dark Matter Reactor has been enclosed in an armored shell, increasing durability at the cost of slightly less power. In the case of a reactor explosion, damage to nearby parts of the ship will be heavily reduced.

Until now, the idea of linking our dark matter reactors to harness more energy has been an impossible one. However, with recent revelations in dark matter theory, we have successfully devised a way to interconnect the spacial inhibitors containing our dark matter, greatly increasing their power efficiency.

A state of the art series of 9 Dark Matter Reactors successfully bound together in an advanced protective lab. This facility features a powerful local shielding generator and several small robots that aid in ship repairs.

Utilizing an incredibly complex series of warp fields, we can create a localized, massive void of energy, naturally filled in with constant amounts of dark energy. We can then harness this dark energy by collapsing the warp fields, yielding a substantial burst of power. A Dark Energy reactor repeats this process in quick succession, never allowing the dark energy to grow out of hand.

This Dark Energy Reactor produces vast amounts of energy. We can only construct a large version. Since the process of harnessing dark energy involves the constant inhibition of its expansion, compromising this system will lead to a catastrophic explosion. Energy and Beam weapons will not damage this reactor, however, owing to the energetic voids within.
We can adapt our atmospheric missile point defense systems for space usage. It might prove useful for countering enemy missiles at a longer range than mass driver point defense systems.

This small turret can launch very fast and agile missiles in a 360 degree field of fire, meant to counter enemy missiles at medium range. The missiles are primed to explode near the targeted enemy missiles, and though their damage is small, the explosive radius is very large. This turret uses a lot of ordnance.
As enemy missiles become more sophisticated, we can compensate by upgrading our Missile Point Defense systems to launch better counter missiles.
This larger Missile Point Defense turret launches heavier, but still very fast missiles to counter enemy missile attacks at long range.
This version of the Mass Driver has a longer barrel, useful for ships with more space. Its projectiles have longer range and a larger explosive radius.
We can develop larger versions of our current subspace artillery weapons.
This is a longer barrel version of the Smaller Dual mass cannon. It has more range and deals more damage.
Even more monstrous than the massive cannon, Only Battleships and Titans can mount this cannon.
We can now research and construct a larger disintegrator array.
This is a smaller array for our smaller ships. It does less damage, but requires less power to operate.
Enemy commanders will quake in fear at the sight of our new large Disintegrator arrays. These hulking weapons can only be fitted on Battleships or Titans, however.
Since the recharge rate of our Class I Shields is rather low, we can invest research into a slightly stronger medium and small shield with a faster recharge rate.
Since the recharge rate of our Class III Shields is rather low, we can attempt to research a slightly stronger large shield with a faster recharge rate.

This medium shield has a very fast recharge rate, which takes some time to kick in after combat. It is also stronger than a regular class I medium shield. Unfortunately, it draws more power in hyperspace.

This large shield has a very fast recharge rate, which takes some time to kick in after combat. It is also stronger than a regular class III large shield. Unfortunately, it draws more power in hyperspace.
We believe it would be possible to further improve our quickly recharging Class I Fast shields by making them a little stronger, and adding the ability to recharge during combat.
We believe it would be possible to further improve our quickly recharging Class III Fast shields by making them a little stronger, and adding the ability to recharge during combat.

This shield has a very fast recharge rate, which takes some time to kick in after combat. It can also recharge during combat, and it is stronger than a regular Class I Fast shield. Unfortunately, it draws more power.

This shield has a very fast recharge rate, which takes some time to kick in after combat. It can also recharge during combat, and it is stronger than a regular Class III Fast shield. Unfortunately, it draws more power.

In order to defend our colonies from the growing danger of enemy fleets, we have recently devised blueprints to construct our first orbital station, a new type of structure that is larger than our small and heavy platforms. In addition, the creation of a long-range missile defense system was deemed imperative for our stations, and these weapons should prove effective against any comparatively long range enemy assaults.

This fixed-mount missile launcher fires salvos of long range missiles which are effective against a wide range of targets. It is only practical for stations, but can also be installed on our heavy platforms.
These hangars are very similar to standard fighter bays, but they can hold our heavy fighters and bombers, at the expense of longer spawn times.
We can develop a Fighter bay which will be able to hold our larger fighter hulls and our bombers as well.
This is a bomber dedicated Anti-Matter bomb bay. The bombs will inflict heavy, pure damage to slower moving enemy capital ships. This module fires 4 bombs per salvo.
We can develop internal Melt bomb bays for our Bombers which would be very powerful versus shields, while also causing some EMP damage.

Melt bombs deal high damage, are effective against shields, and cause some EMP damage. They are slightly more accurate and robust in comparison to other fighter bombs, but they are also slower. This module fires 3 bombs per salvo.
We can develop internal shield-bomb bays for our bombers. These bombs were developed to counter ships that rely on shields as their only means of defense.

Shield Bombs are specifically designed to counter enemies who only use shields to defend their ships. These bombs have a 75% chance to bypass shields and damage ship components, while delivering a small amount of EMP damage. They are not very effective against armor, however. This module fires 3 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Ion Bomb Bay 4. It fires 6 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Ion Bomb Bay 4. It fires 8 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Anti-Matter Bomb Bay 4. It fires 6 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Anti-Matter Bomb Bay 4. It fires 8 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Plasma Bomb Bay 4. It fires 6 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Plasma Bomb Bay 4. It fires 8 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Melt Bomb Bay 3. It fires 4 bombs per salvo.
This is a bigger version of the Shield-Bomb Bay 3. It fires 4 bombs per salvo.
These are truly high fire rate laser weapons. They also do more damage and require more power to maintain.

This is an improvement over the basic electromagnetic capacitor. Any ship equipped with pulse capacitors will be substantially more difficult to disable with electromagnetic pulse weaponry. They also aid the ship to recover faster from EMP overloads
This is an improvement over the small basic pulse capacitor, meant for ships with tight space. It is less efficient than the bigger version.
Protecting our ships from EMP damage is becoming a necessity. We can design advanced, more efficient versions of our basic pulse capacitors.

We can now construct a very interesting Class I Shield variant. It is now almost fully resistant to Energy beams, accomplished by nullifying their temperature on impact. Hence the term, "Blue Shield". These shields recharge during combat, provide a large protection radius, and consume high amounts of power.

We can now construct a very interesting Class III Shield variant. It is now almost fully resistant to Energy beams, accomplished by nullifying their temperature on impact. Hence the term, "Blue Shield". These shields recharge during combat, provide a large protection radius, and consume high amounts of power.
This shield has a high protection radius and is almost fully resistant to Energy Beams, yet also decently resistant to Energy Projectiles. It recharges during combat, but has a high power demand.
This shield has a high protection radius and is almost fully resistant to Energy Beams, yet also decently resistant to Energy Projectiles. It recharges during combat, but has a high power demand.
This 3 barreled turret fires high explosive rounds and is a bit faster than the Type 80. It is also more armored.

Rather than depending on a living being, we can easily design an AI program to take control of a smaller drone fighter. This comes with multiple advantages, such as the elimination of life support systems, as well as greater capacity for acceleration and turning speed. These drones can be launched from a special tube able to be installed on larger ship hulls.
This is our first Drone AI command module. It contains the hardware and software of an independent drone, as well as basic power generation and storage.
After improving our knowledge in power generation techniques, we are now able to construct an improved command module that can generate and store twice the amount of earlier modules.
This drone command module as a basic shield installed as well as an improved software, enabling it to track more than one target.
This is a small bomb bay intended for a drone. Typically, it contains only 4 bombs, and the drone will need to resupply at its mothership after two or three bomb runs.
A pulse beam specifically modified for use on a drone. It is very accurate, but not as strong as its larger counterpart.
This attack cannon fires 5 rounds at high velocity in close range bursts. It has limited ammo, usually sufficient enough for a short skirmish.

This Basic engine provides thrust and turn thrust for the drone. Drones can withstand much greater G-forces than if a living being were to be present. It is also equipped with a small secondary command unit that can track targets, should the main command module be destroyed.
This improved engine provides more thrust, as well as some more power storage for the power hungry weapon modules.
This drone engine module provides a little less thrust than the improved engine module, but also comes fitted with a basic shield, providing increased survivability for the drone.
This is a simple rocket launcher that can be fitted on a drone. It has less range than a standard rocket launcher.
A tube used to launch a drone into combat. It is cheaper and smaller in comparison to fighter bays, as airlocks are not needed for the drone.

This Storage locker has been augmented with an army of small Nanobots that assemble the needed type of ammunition from raw materials. Within, ammunition is created in very small parts, allowing this locker to fit 4 times the ordnance of a normal ordnance pod. Drawbacks are higher production cost and a small explosion if the locker is destroyed.

We can accelerate the high-pressure system used to vent plasma from the ship's reactors. This can increase damage output by a high percentage. The density of the plasma will make it slightly more effective versus shields.

We can use calibrated reactor power to further narrow the focus of the plasma streams, making the plasma flame more destructive. This comes with a much higher power cost, but it is more effective against shields.
Using more power and higher pressure systems leads to very focused and lethal plasma vents, at the expense of higher power and ordnance consumption.
This plasma thrower uses a higher pressure vent system and increases the damage of the plasma cloud. It also fares well against shields.
This plasma thrower vents a more focused plasma cloud thanks to power transfer from the ship's reactors. It is very good versus Shields, but requires high power and more ordnance.
Advancements into new types battery technology allow us to manufacture higher capacity Power Cells.
This Small Power Cell can store 50% more power than the basic one.
This Medium Power Cell can store 50% more power than the basic one.
We can further improve our short range missile technology by creating more destructive missiles, with additional range and utility.
This is an improved version of the Shadow Storm, with more missiles per salvo, and increased damage per missile. However, they have a slightly lower chance to penetrate enemy shields.

Likely the longest range weapon ever created, This orbital missile emplacement will launch a barrage of devastatingly powerful and maneuverable missiles, designed to target frigates and larger ships. Missile carriers are launched which propel themselves to the target and separate into multiple fast and evasive rockets.
This orbital missile launcher fires large missiles which are designed to strike frigates and larger ships. It features an extremely long range, and a separation phase when missiles near the target.
This is the planetary version of the Heavy Laser Turret. It can target everything in a short planetary range.
Fires Heavy Laser pulses. Short Range.
This is the planetary version of the Disruptor Turret. It has increased damage over the Heavy Laser Turret, but is too imprecise to target Fighters.
Fires Heavy Disruptor pulses. Cannot target Fighters.
This is the planetary version of the Photon Turret. Its major advantages are explosive projectiles and longer range.
Fires Photon Charges. Medium range. Explosive payload.
This planetary defense emplacement fires guided torpedoes over very long range. The torpedoes are huge and armored, thus physically resistant to point defense.
Vast amounts of power is used to deliver a lethal plasma cloud which is also excellent versus shields. Sadly, with high power requirements and slightly less range.

This is a longer version of the Gauss Sniper Cannon. Mainly designed for Frigates and above, it has a longer range with higher damage. It requires more power to fire and maintain, as well as larger shells.

This is a longer version of the Gauss Sniper AP Cannon. Mainly designed for Frigates and above, it has a longer range with higher damage. It requires more power to fire and maintain, as well as larger shells.

This is a longer version of the Gauss Sniper HEAP Cannon. Mainly designed for Frigates and above, it has a longer range with higher damage. It requires more power to fire and maintain, as well as larger shells.
This is a forward facing version of the H.V.E Shotgun, designed for Fighter to Frigate roles. It has less range and a limited field of fire, but also lower cost and mass.
This is a forward facing version of the Repeater Shotgun, designed for Fighter to Frigate roles. It has less range and a limited field of fire, but also lower cost and mass.
This is a forward facing version of the E.S Shotgun, designed for Fighter to Frigate roles. It has less range and a limited field of fire, but also lower cost and mass.
This is a forward facing version of the Dragon Breath Shotgun, designed for Fighter to Frigate roles. It has less range and a limited field of fire, but also lower cost and mass.
This is the planetary version of the Rapid Laser Cannon. It can target everything in a Medium planetary range and fires repeating bursts of laser pulses at a high rate.
Fires Rapid Laser pulses. Medium Range.
From Orbit, it appears as nothing out of the ordinary. However, your fleet commander insists these are the right coordinates, and ground troops should be sent to investigate.

Friendly natives have been found living on this planet. They are very skilled workers and enjoy bartering for almost any of our trinkets. They offer friendship to the rulers of this planet. +1 production and +1 food per turn to the owner of this planet.
Advanced Capital Engines that provide 50% more thrust, but require double the power.
Advanced Titan Engines that provide 50% more thrust, but require double the power.
This Cockpit allows for two pilots to sit side by side, with more integration between systems. It's slightly better than 2 separate cockpits.
This Cockpit allows for two pilots to sit one behind the other, with more integration between systems. It's slightly better than 2 separate cockpits.
A larger module with 2 linked shield generators provides over twice the shield power of a single shield generator, but also at the cost of more than twice the power supply.
This drone cannon has an increased fire rate and a high chance to penetrate shields. It was designed as an anti-fighter weapon, as fighters often depend specifically on shields.
This drone cannon is designed to cause large amounts of damage to armor by overcoming the armor's deflection characteristics.

Although possessing a slightly lower fire rate than the repeater cannon, this drone cannon fires exploding, armor piercing rounds. The rounds are, however, less effective at armor penetration when compared to the AP cannon. The rounds also have a chance to penetrate shields.
An Ion pulse beam, specifically modified to fit within a drone. It is very accurate, but not as powerful as its bigger version.
In order for our small crafts to survive battles with larger ships, they require better shields. These shields will recharge during combat, but they require more energy to maintain.
With the ability to recharge during combat, along with resistance to beam weaponry, these shields should noticeably improve the battle capabilities of our small crafts.
This is an improved version of the Fast Fighter Shield. It can recharge during combat, but it demands more power.
This Fighter Shield version is similar to the Fighter Battle Shield, but with high resistance to Energy and Beam weapons as well.
This is an improved version of the Advanced Fighter Fast Shield. It can recharge during combat, but it demands more power.
This Fighter Shield version is similar to the Advanced Fighter Battle Shield, but with high resistance to Energy and Beam weapons as well.
Utilizing our knowledge of Xeno Genetics, along with our highly advanced computer networks, we can design a fearsome biological weapon.

We can create an even deadlier biological bomb. Assuming we dont mind some... Experimenting. Retaining ethical treatment, we can conduct non life-threatening, temporary trials on test subjects. Be them prisoners of war... Volunteers... Or our own, unsuspecting citizens.

Special zones on the planet, specifically designed to house a large amount of the population while maintaining ordinary living standards. Our population will find them more than acceptable to live in.

Mega Cities are designed to house as much population as is comfortably possible, featuring automated technology to maintain optimal living conditions. It features buildings that rise high into the sky, and bridges interconnecting them. Due to the structure's massive size as well as the resources devoted to construction, large amounts of material must be removed from the surrounding soil, reducing fertility on the planet by a small amount.
This structure was specifically designed to house a large amount of the population while maintaining ordinary living standards. These zones can house 1 billion citizens.

A Mega City is a zone with high rise skyscrapers, dedicated to housing 2 Billion population in decent living conditions. Due to the loss of vast expanses of arable land, fertility is slightly reduced.
(-0.2) Fertility on build, +2 max population, +50 storage

This is the largest Disruptor cannon we can usefully mount on a spaceship. These Dual cannons can disrupt more efficiently, making them more effective against shields. They also have a better chance to completely penetrate shields.
A bigger version of the Heavy Laser Turret. It can pack quite a punch, increasing its effectiveness versus armor.
Massive Polaron Cannons mounted on a turret platform with advanced cooling systems for rapid and sustained fire. Bypasses shields.
This is a unique bomb module for drones. It contains 8 miniature fusion bombs designed to strike capital ships. The drone can fire them all in a single bomb run.

The need to defend our colonies against enemy invasion grows constantly. Our engineers have designed a substantially large battle station that will bolster the defensive prowess of our more important planets. We have also iterated upon our orbital missile launchers, a step toward nullifying the threat of long range enemy weapons.

These hugely massive stations are larger than most titans, and will serve our planets tremendously against almost any threat. Advancements in missile technology have also lead us to an ingenious new orbital missile defense weapon, perfectly suited to combat any large invasion fleet, no matter their range.

Subspace Projectors greatly speed up stardrive speeds for ships within their influence. We can use them as "fast lanes" in our empire. They also have a very large sensor coverage and can be used for spying near enemy borders. Orbital Platforms are also our first step into the colony orbital defense path. These small orbitals, when grouped together, can fend off entire small invasion fleets.

For decades, our scientists have understood and been able to utilize the quantum forces of the graviton particle, in applications such as gravitational plating and warp travel. Now, with our newfound mastery over it, we have been able to devise an incredibly powerful weapon.
Massive Photon Cannons mounted on a turret platform. These bigger cannons fire larger Photon torpedoes.
This turret will unleash rapid fire energy projectiles that will penetrate whatever shields the enemy may have, along with doing twice the damage to armor. It has a medium to long range.
Fusion particle beams gain increased damage over laser beams, but are much less efficient. This particular model is mounted on a swivel to achieve a 120 degree field of fire.
The Heavy Phasor Beam Turret provides a devastating dual Phasor beam with a 120 degree field of fire.
The Heavy Laser Beam Turret provides a dual Laser beam with a 120 degree field of fire.
A more advanced version of the initial Shape Memory Technology. Mass is unchanged.
The most advanced Shape Memory Internal bulkhead we currently possess. It can withstand powerful internal explosions.
This is an improved version of the Original Internal Bulkhead. It is more durable and resists explosions.
This is a more advanced version of the Improved Internal Bulkhead. It is even more durable and has better explosive resistance.
This is an improved version of the Original Reinforced Bulkhead. It is more durable and resists explosions.
This is a more advanced version of the Improved Reinforced Bulkhead. It is even more durable and has better explosive resistance.
Ballistic and Missile weapons will pass through the first Medium sized armor (or 2 small) module encountered. The armor will take no damage.
Ballistic and Missile weapons will pass through the first Large sized armor (or 3 small) module encountered. The armor will take no damage.
Rockets are unguided, fast projectiles with high payloads stored in pods.
Increased sized and damage Rocket pod technology.
Hydra rocket pods are very small, able to be mounted on most of our smallest ships. They fire a barrage of quick moving rockets which deal slightly extra damage towards armor.
Talon Rockets are an improvement over the Hydra Rockets. The pod is slightly larger, has higher range, and deals more damage. In addition, they are very effective against armor.
A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Reactive Armor plate for added durability. It has 60% of the strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate.
A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Ceramic Armor plate for added durability. It has 60% of the strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate.
A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Composite Alloys Armor plate for added durability. It has 60% of the strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate.

A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Crystal Armor plate for added durability. An effective weapon against fighters and missiles. It has 60% of the strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate.

A Heavy Machine Gun turret mounted on a Hyper Active Armor plate for added durability. An effective weapon against fighters and missiles. It has 60% of the strength and 75% Deflection of the non weapon Armor plate.
This is a massive shield for its size, with more protection range and more shielding
It is now possible to improve the output of our Class V shields, along with adding Composite Alloy armor plates around them for more protection.
The best Canopy Shield Generator we can safely install on a starship.
It is now possible to improve the output of our Canopy shields, along with adding Active Armor plates around them for more protection.

A larger version of our small nano ordnance locker. The larger space means fewer walls, making it more efficient. It holds more ordnance than 4 smaller nano lockers, but produces a dangerous localized explosion if destroyed.
A squadron of 4 Home Defense Fighters

This facility will support a squadron of 4 Fighters that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Fighters available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.
A wing of 16 Home Defense Fighters

This facility will support a wing of 16 Fighters that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Fighters available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.
A squadron of 3 Home Defense Corvettes

This facility will support a squadron of 3 Corvettes that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Corvettes available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.
A wing of 9 Home Defense Corvettes

This facility will support a wing of 9 Corvettes that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Corvettes available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.
A squadron of 2 Home Defense Frigates

This facility will support a squadron of 2 Frigates that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Frigates available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.
A wing of 4 Home Defense Frigates

This facility will support a wing of 4 Frigates that will leap into the colony's defense when an enemy is spotted. It will launch the best Frigates available in your empire. You will be able to control them only in battle. They cost Money to Launch, but you get it back if they make it back home.

A laser is a device that emits light through a process of optical amplification based on the stimulated emission of electromagnetic radiation. The term "laser" originated as an acronym for "light amplification by stimulated emission of radiation". A laser differs from other sources of light in that it emits light coherently. Spatial coherence allows a laser to be focused to a tight spot, which with enough power, can be a deadly weapon.
An Advanced shield used by Remnant Fighters.
This is an improved version of the Standard Fighter Shield. It has a much faster recharge rate, but it needs more time before recharge starts.
This is an improved version of the Advanced Fighter Shield. After a decently long cool down, it can recharge very quickly.
Provides a 5% hit point bonus to all ship modules.
Provides a 10% hit point bonus to all ship modules.
Provides a 15% hit point bonus to all ship modules.
Provides a 20% hit point bonus to all ship modules.
Provides a 25% hit point bonus to all ship modules.
prosper in Barren worlds, and like Ice, Steppe and Tundra worlds. They dislike Oceanic, Swamp and Desert Worlds.
prosper in Ice worlds, and like Tundra, Steppe, and Terran worlds. They dislike Desert, Barren and Swamp Worlds.
prosper in Oceanic worlds, and like Terran, Steppe and Swamp worlds. They dislike Barren and Desert Worlds.
prosper in Swamp worlds, and like Terran, Oceanic, Steppe and Tundra worlds. They dislike Barren, Ice and Desert Worlds.
prosper in Desert worlds, and like Swamp, Steppe oceanic and Terran worlds. They dislike Barren, ice and Tundra Worlds.
prosper in Steppe worlds, and like Desert and Ice, worlds. They dislike Barren, Swamp and Oceanic Worlds.
prosper in Tundra worlds, and like Ice, Terran worlds. They dislike Barren, Desert and Swamp Worlds.
prosper in Terran worlds, and like Steppe and Swamp worlds. They dislike barren, Ice and Desert Worlds.
This is our first attempt in creating reliable energy beam weapon, it is crude, but should be effective.
Using an improved type of barrel and loading mechanism, Advanced flak cannons improve range, velocity and damage over the previous versions.
This is our first attempt in creating reliable energy beam weapon, it is crude, but should be effective.

With the introduction of new technologies, our efforts in the creation of a powerful beam have been made successful. We managed to create some new experimental phasor weapons, but since we do not fully understand our discovery, these weapons are not perfectly optimized.
Experimental Dual Phasors are our first venture into the creation a dual beam weapon. Unfortunately, the inherent instability of the powerful dual beams limits their maximum range.

Early Phasor prototype, its pure destructive power usually comes with the price of increased size. As a side effect, the extended length of this beam weapon has increased its maximum range, and also mysteriously amplified its mass repulsion effect.
A Supersonic Stabilized Cannon enhanced with our newest autoloader systems.
The Supersonic Stabilized Cannon shoots projectiles at very high velocity. It also features impressive reload times.
An Energy gatling weapon. Designed to continuously rotate massive barrel heads to prevent overheating from rapid fire.
R.A.D. can shoot in rapid succession, so long as the ship can provide the needed power.
This antiquated beam weapon design was previously abandoned due to its lower overall damage potential.
This weapon may not initially appear impressive when considering the weak damage potential, but as it turns out, it's very good at damaging shields and disrupting onboard power flow.
A giant single beam system mounted on a turret.

The unique design of this large beam system gives it an interesting side effect. Thanks to more densely packed particles within the magnetized stream, there is a slight lock-on effect when multiplying the mass of the target, making tracking more precise.
A compact weapon of mass destruction.
For a missile of this size, it's a strikingly devastating weapon. Not only does it melt armor, but it also emits a deadly EMP blast.
A weapon designed around its energized missile warhead.
The sole purpose of the Magnetrom is to swiftly destroy enemy shields, thereby overloading the vulnerable ship's electronics and massively draining any stored power.
Missiles constructed from an incredibly durable material.
Tritanium Missiles are a straightforward weapon. A missile that can receive massive amounts of damage, yet still deliver its payload to the target.
A highly advanced Kinetic weapon that uses energy to propel the shells.
The Enforcer is a rapid fire weapon system. It requires both power and ordnance to shoot.
A prototype weapon, created in an effort to bridge the gap between energy and ordnance based cannons.

Cyclone represents the worst and best of both worlds. It features high projectile speeds, great damage, extensive range, and a low cool down, but it requires substantial amounts of power and ordnance to fire.
A weapon specifically designed to support long range engagements, providing firepower from the back lines.

This ingenious weapon utilizes Dark Matter as a projectile. The process to confine and stabilize such a force was made successful by transferring small amounts of Dark Matter from our collectors, then wrapping them into their own individualized charges that can be loaded into a projectile chamber. Upon impact, they release their devastating power.

The most compact Dark Matter cannon. A fixed position cannon that fires small bursts of stabilized Dark Matter. Doesn't require ordnance or power to fire. Produces small yield explosion when destroyed.
A Dark Matter turret. Fires in semi-rapid succession. Doesn't require ordnance or power to fire. Produces small yield explosion when destroyed.
A Heavy Dark Matter turret with an expanded field of fire coverage. Features a burst weapon firing system. Doesn't require ordnance or power to fire. Produces small yield explosion when destroyed.
A Shield module with integrated capacitors for better efficiency.
The integration of capacitors into this shield module has yielded an improvement in shield strength. Provides a small additional benefit of storing some ship-wide power.
A very durable piece of Ancient Armor. Can be used both as an internal bulkhead, or as external armor.
Ancient armor is covered in a gold-like coating. Each armor module is made of smaller pieces that tear off when struck.
Your ship detected an abandoned warehouse on the surface, send troops to investigate.
Shady places are perfect ground to gamble. With right connections we can make a profit.
Having slaves is such an convenient labour force, sadly we need to feed them as well.

The underhive is the most run-down city on the planet where most of the rules are created by Corsair gangs. It is a difficult place to live where the power has long been turned off. People rule through fear and shun the rich that live in the capital.
You can't stop the underhive, and the smugglers keep profiting from it.

Due to the small size of our platforms, the creation of compact orbital weapons now seems to be a necessity. Such weapons would be able to fire in all directions, but as a result we will only be able to install them on our small and heavy platforms. They will feature a high range 360 degree field of fire, and will be armed with kinetic projectile rounds.

With advancements in weapons technology, we can develop an improved version of our previous platform kinetic cannons. This Mk2 Orbital Kinetic Cannon will fire faster rounds, have an even higher range, and deal more damage than its predecessor.

With the success of our previous platform cannons, our engineers have determined that the best path forward in platform weaponry would be the creation of a high-powered, extremely compact cannon. It will deal even more damage, have an incredibly high range, and even higher projectile speed. The longer reload time should make it worth it.
In peaceful times, our people had no need for massive factories. Steady growth and a clean environment were always our way of life. +1 homeworld fertility
Our first fighter hull provides the basic needs of the military. However, in order to expand our tactical options, we can invest time and research into the designing of another, larger fighter hull.
We can develop yet another fighter hull, designed to be used as a heavy fighter.
Our first Corvette hull was a success. We can now design a heavier, larger corvette hull that will add more diversity to our ship arsenal.
Furthering the diversity of our Corvette hulls can help us overcome future military challenges.
We can research a new frigate hull. It may be an extension of our current frigate hull, or even a brand new design. Regardless, it will have more potential.

Frigates can play a major part in a fleet. They can even be launched from a carrier ship, assuming the carrier is large enough. We can design an upgrade, or a brand new frigate hull to further increase our combat options.
Cruisers are the backbone of any fleet. It is recommended that we research heavier cruiser types in order to keep up with the military's demands.
In order to strengthen our core fleets, we believe developing another, heavier cruiser design would be a good decision.
We can design a larger Battleship to command and coordinate our fleets.
A larger Battleship, almost as big as a Titan, can be researched and introduced into the war effort.

We can now design the marvel of our empire. This ship design is around twice the size of the first Titan we have designed. This Super Titan will proudly represent the height of our Empire's military might. The production cost of these ships is so high that building one would be a massive undertaking. Building too many might be an unwise decision.
Most advanced type of space battery, 2 enormous barrels providing firepower to bring down biggest of ships.
The damage output of these monstrosities can overwhelm any enemy ship, as well as their own ship's power reserves.
prosper in Terran worlds, and like Steppe and Tundra and Ice worlds. They dislike Barren, Desert Swamp amd Oceanic Worlds.
New line of rocket pods build upon very effective Talon class rockets.
This is the top of the line in short range missile systems, using the newest technologies in missile structures to improve their utility, range, and most importantly, damage.
This Venom pod is an improvement over the Talon pod in that it fires more missiles per attack, at only slightly lower damage per missile. They also have a slight chance to penetrate enemy shields.
With this extremely deadly rocket pod, we are now able to launch missiles that deal twice the normal damage to armor. Their chance to penetrate shields is also increased.
